body.name: Large Clear Tote Bag, Fashion PVC Shoulder Handbag for Women, Clear Stadium Bag for Security Travel,Shopping,Sports and Work
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 44 mins
features: STRONG AND DEPENDABLE:Clear tote bag made of high quality heavy duty transparent PVC material. More durable and strong!
HIGH-CAPACITY: It measures 19 x 14 x 5.7 inches - big enough to hold a digital camera, suntan lotion,a water bottle, wallet, cell phone, hat, sunglasses, and more, all at once.

ATTENTIVE DESIGN:The clear stadium bag made of wear-resistant nylon fabric bottom with reinforced stitching makes it last for a long time.The nylon handles are reinforced so you can comfortably carry a heavy load.

SAVE TIME AND TROUBLE: Forget about wasting your time trying to find your mobile phone or your keys.A top zipper closure to keep your items secure as well as a front pocket to keep items for quick access.
THE BEST GIFT:Unique clear shoulder bag is perfect gift for your friend or just for yourself to go Sports,shopping, travel, party, work&beach

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Clear Tote Bag looks simple and fashionable. Water-resistant PVC material with reinforced nylon handles, so that you can quickly and easily find all your most important items without needing to dump the contents of your purse! Great for airport security, art supplies bag, grocery, or day trips and family vacations to the beach, amusement parks, and other tourist activities. Keep all your things clean and dry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bag is sturdy and has an outside pocket. The main compartment has a zipper and it holds a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag has been holding up well. I mainly use it to put meal preps in as well as frozen waters. Seems to be sturdy and good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bag has been very beneficial for working in a warehouse, attending graduations, football games, and other places doesn’t allow purses/ bags. It’s very durable, non fading, and it’s a nice size to carry all of your essential needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do you work in a correctional setting? Inexpensive bag, but will wear out
reviews.reviewText: If you work in a correctional setting like me, you might be required to have clear bags. I have purchased a couple of these because they are decent size, I like the side pockets, and they are inexpensive. Just know that if you use these daily (I do) and have a lot of heavy objects in them over time (water bottles, lunches, etc.), this will wear down. However, having said that, they are inexpensive, and I will continue to purchase additional ones as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and serves the purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of space.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two because my husband and I do water aerobics. All of our stuff: towel, shower items, personal items such as our car keys, etc., fits. We can sit them on the floor if needed at the pool and our items will not get wet. You can see through them, so they will also be great when we go to football games. There is an outside pocket too. This tote is a thick plastic which holds up well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great item to protect my bags
reviews.reviewText: I like purchasing bags around the world and I noticed I have dozens of bags I did not use at all purely because they are suede leather, or white leather or just expensive designer items.This large transparent bag solves the problem since I can put the above mentioned inside yet still see the designer label or the colour of my bag I love and protect it at the same time from crazy people who dragged my clothes, hair etc in the London underground for example or dirtying my light trousers and then shouting abuse at me if I dared complain. I know, we live in a crazy world and decades of charity helping my community and planet still did not make my life easier when I come across nutters of the world.We can only try protecting the beautiful things, right?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a lot
reviews.reviewText: Ripped after two years of daily use, so not bad for the price. Repeat purchase

reviews.reviewTitle: Prinzipiell perfekte Größe aber die Henkel reißen ab
reviews.reviewText: Ich hatte mich richtig gefreut, endlich mal eine Tasche die groß genug ist für meine Uni Sachen, aber die Henkel reißen leider ab wenn man die Tasche länger benutzt. Super schade, aber von der Größe perfekt. Wenn man nur leichte Sachen hat dann ist es gut, aber bloß keine Bücher…
